lines.text: I am not here for your cold roast chicken. I am here for your love.

[at a gas station]
I require unleaded food for my horses.
You've seen what I do, and it's obvious I'm not a guy the gods want hanging around.
Not true, Ted; my friend Medusa could really use your help!
I don't do snakes, and I don't belong with the gods. Venus, I'm just a mortal.

[picking up a blow dryer]
Just a mortal who can harness the wind!
